full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Hi Heath,

After speaking with Renee, we have agreed on the following:

MOBILE CHANGES:

Change the Headline from "Enrol with Little Scribblers" to "Little Scribblers Kindergarten"


DESKTOP CHANGES:


  1. Change the Headline from "Enrol with Little Scribblers" to "Little Scribblers Kindergarten"

  2. Please reinstate the slogan "Where Montessori meets..." just on the desktop version as between the headline/button the negative space looks off which was Renee's main concern.

  3. There are 2 language switching flags at the top in the headline? Please fix this.



Thanks,
Dimitri

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and Dimitri,

Thank you for your prompt work on the recent design. I appreciate the quick turnaround.

However, I regret to inform you that I find the design too small and lacking the visual impact we're aiming for. It doesn't stand out or catch the eye as intended. Additionally, our tagline should be included underneath the design to complete the overall look.

Please let me know if we can revisit this to ensure it aligns with our goals.

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
@rica All good on this one.
